alert.note: Alert for Emanuel; Johnson; Laurens; Montgomery; Toombs; Treutlen; Wheeler (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 09 at 12:10PM EST until January 09 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Laurens County in central Georgia... Northwestern Toombs County in southeastern Georgia... Southwestern Emanuel County in east central Georgia... Treutlen County in east central Georgia... South central Johnson County in east central Georgia... Northern Wheeler County in central Georgia... Northern Montgomery County in central Georgia... * Until 100 PM EST. * At 1209 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near East Dublin to near Cedar Grove, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dublin, Swainsboro, Soperton, Vidalia, East Dublin, Adrian, Oak Park, Higgston, Nunez, Tarrytown, Lothair, Covena, Cedar Grove, Rockledge, Norristown, Barnhill, Minter, Zaidee, Gillis Springs, and Landsburg. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 PM EST for central, southeastern and east central Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Emanuel; Johnson; Laurens; Montgomery; Toombs; Treutlen; Wheeler
